ref: 13266 sárga m. ʻ race, host, draught of air, gush ʼ RV., ʻ creation ʼ MaitrUp., ʻ chapter of an epic poem ʼ Kāv. [√sr̥j]
Pk. sagga -- m. ʻ release, creation ʼ;
K. sagun ʻ to irrigate (garden or field) ʼ, sagawun ʻ to sprinkle water (on a plant &c.) ʼ;
Si. saga ʻ chapter, part of a literary work ʼ. -- See Add.
